description: Adaptation to the effects of drought and climate change in agro-ecological regions I and II in Zambia.

subproject.description: To deliver 4 key results: Climate change risks integrated into critical decision-making processes for agricultural management at the local, sub-national and national levels; Agricultural productivity made resilient to the anticipated impacts of climate change; National fiscal, regulatory and development policy revised to promote adaptation responses in the agricultural sector; and  Knowledge and lessons learned compiled and disseminated to support implementation of adaptation measures in agroecological regions I and II in Zambia.
subproject.title: Adaptation to climate change

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations

title: Adaptation to effects of drought & Climate Change in Zam
